title: Project SAM - Organ Mystique [CUSTOM KONTAKT]
description:
Torrent Info:
==============

I downloaded this from a download website, however, since there was no top-level library files included, I had to make a custom one. This also means that there is no custom interface on the instruments (but at least you can still use it!).

This is NOT the expanded (EXP) version of the library!

Also, this one is packaged in .7z format, instead of being uncompressed. This is because there were too many files, which made the torrent too large for TBP.

Unless you really need to, please do not delete the .7z file once you have extracted it, so that you can seed, which will help other people in the same way that I have (hopefully) helped you :)


Torrent Contents:
==================

7-Zip Archive, containing:

  Custom Kontakt Library
  Samples


Installation:
==============

Extract, then add the extracted folder as a library to (cracked) Kontakt.


Product Info:
==============

ProjectSAMs Organ Mystique features a beautifully sampled, intimate and, at times, haunted sounding church organ, covering multi-samples of seven distinct keyboard stops, three bass stops and, as you have come to expect of ProjectSAM, a range of unique special effects.

SAM Organ Mystique is located in a church near a small Dutch village. During WOII, a German airplane crashed into the church, tearing down the front part and killing brave members of the resistance. Although beautifully restored, some of the walls still bear the scars of this sad, historic day. The villagers say, when the organ is played, you can still hear it weep for the fallen soldiers of 1944.
